ValidationRule.description: Quote/ Opportunity should not be created on Standard Pricebook.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISNEW(), OR( SBQQ__PriceBook__r.Name = "Standard Price Book", SBQQ__PriceBook__r.IsStandard = TRUE), NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY))
/*OR( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY , $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator') ) )*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote should not be created using the Standard Price Book. Please populate the Account Territory Hierarchy and try again.
